value:
The harvest festival is a chance for
everyone to get to know each other...
So...why do some insist on fighting?

We...never did anything like this
back in my village in Nabata, so all
of this is...quite the shock.

At first...I was taken aback by this
outfit. But now that I've worn it
for a while...it has grown on me.

Festivals may end...but their spirits
live on. Gratitude for the land's
bounty will light the path forward.

Trickery, you say? Oh... I don't think
I have it in me. Have you asked Fae?
I'm certain...she would love all this.

You are $Nf's
friend...right?$k$pMy name is Sophia. This is...a token
of the land's bounty.

I feel light-headed, but...in a good
way this time.
I foresee that my trick will succeed...

Oh, my... Did I truly frighten you?
My apologies.

I must give thanks for the land's
generosity...and for yours. I will
etch this feeling into my heart.

I am...Sophia, a priestess from the
Nabata Desert. My vision of this
festival is one of gratitude and joy.

When I received an invitation to this
festival...I began to experience visions
of people laughing and smiling...$k$pNow that I have spent time with
other festivalgoers, it is clear that
they were the ones whom I saw.$k$pIn the remote Nabata Desert, I lived
away from the wider world, unaware
of anything beyond its borders.$k$pBut...this festival has shown me
that the world is an amazing place,
filled with amazing people.$k$pI am glad to have had the chance to
see so many new, smiling faces.
It...truly means a lot to me.
はっ…
やあっ…
きゃっ…
だめ…
How sweet...
Candy, please...
Tricked you!
The festival spirit...
What...a treat...
うふふ…
I've been told...this is for the harvest festival...
Oh... Candy? ...For me? How kind of you...
Are spiders...scary enough?
Fae will be looking forward to sweets...so I will do my best for her...
The festival atmosphere is certainly infectious... What fun...
The festival lights twinkle...like little stars...
I...had some extra candy, so...I thought we could share.
In that case...
Is this...a trick?
On my way...
